snippet: Scientists have mapped how a group of fearsome, massive dinosaurs evolved and shrank to the likes of robins and hummingbirds....

headline.print_headline: Study Traces Dinosaur Evolution Into Early Birds
headline.main: Study Traces Dinosaur Evolution Into Early Birds

lead_paragraph: Scientists have mapped how a group of fearsome, massive dinosaurs evolved and shrank to the likes of robins and hummingbirds.
